Clubhouse: A New Social Tool for Lawyers

Clubhouse is a new social network that has achieved accelerated growth in a short time. Whether this is due to its invitation-only exclusivity, the FOMO phenomenon, or simply because it is easy to listen to while multitasking, the fact remains that Clubhouse is becoming both a major social hub and a great tool for increasing exposure.

In this article, we discuss what microbrowsers are and what you need to implement to get your website ready for social sharing.

Tip of the Month

Update Health & Safety Attributes on Your GMB Listing

During the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic, you can add new Health & Safety attributes to your Google My Business listing. Keep your clients informed about the additional health and safety measures your office is taking, such as required appointments, masks, and temperature checks. While adding this information to your profile, double-check that your Accessibility, Amenities, Planning, and Service options are all up to date.

Websites that are not mobile responsive are by nature poorly designed as they don’t provide an optimal user experience. At Justia, all of our designs are responsive and we optimize our websites to ensure a great user experience which leads to higher conversion rates.

Did You Know?

Phone Stuffing is Not Allowed on Google Posts

The Google Posts content policy for Google My Business (GMB) now officially prohibits “phone stuffing” (the practice of including phone numbers in your GMB posts). While many marketers were already aware that Google frequently rejects posts that include phone numbers, this policy change clarifies the official guidance. Don’t worry – you can still put your number on your profile and include a “Call now” button with your post.
